description.name: 50mm disc for rust
description.long_desc:
Dysk ścierny o średnicy 50mm wykonany z elastycznej włókniny Clean&Strip.

Włóknina dzięki swojej strukturze i dużej sprężystości umożliwia czyszczenie powierzchni płaski, jak i powierzchni o bardziej złożonych kształtach.

Tarcze tego typu wykorzystywane są przede wszystkim do czyszczenia powierzchni z rdzy, czyszczenia spawów , różnego rodzaju farb, szpachli, zgorzelin.

Włókniną można również obrabiać takie materiały jak np. : metale kolorowe, drewno, stal nierdzewna, stał konstrukcyjna, tworzywa sztuczne itp.

  • przestrzenna konstrukcja zapobiega zapychaniu i przegrzewaniu się materiału
  • liczne kanałki odprowadzające ciepło i pył z dala od obrabianej powierzchni
  • duża sprężystość materiału

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Materiał: włóknina Clean&Strip

Nasyp: węglik krzemu

Średnica zewnętrzna: 50 mm

description.name: Ball joint set 3pcs 1/2" 3/8" 1/4" Cr-Mo
description.long_desc:
Set of 3 ball joints in sizes 1/4, 3/8, and 1/2 ". Ball joints allow you to reach hard-to-reach places and deeply seated screws. Reinforced chrome-molybdenum steel construction increases their impact resistance.


Product Features



  • 1/4, 3/8, and 1/2 " socket

  • Allows you to work at an angle from 0 to 25°

  • For use with pneumatic and electric impact wrenches

  • Structure made of reinforced chromium-molybdenum steel

  • Blockade (ball) securing against accidental loss of the joint

  • Hole for use with the pin

  • Overall length: 44 mm (1/4") / 54 mm (3/8") / 72 mm (1/2")

description.name: Diesel injector seat cutter set 5pcs
description.long_desc:
Zestaw frezów przeznaczony do czyszczenia i dekarbonizacji gniazd wtryskiwaczy. Zestaw używany do ponownego nacinania gniazd wtryskiwaczy podczas regeneracji silników wysokoprężnych oraz przy wymianie wtryskiwaczy. Zestaw nadaje się do większości samochodów z silnikami diesla.

Zawartość opakowania:

  • uchwyt centrujący
  • 15x19mm frez płaski - uniwersalny
  • 17x17mm frez płaski - wtryski Delphi/Bosch (BMW/PSA/RENAULT/FORD)
  • 17x19mm frez płaski - wtryski Bosch (Mercedes CRD)
  • 17x21mm frez kątowy - Fiat/Iveco
  • klucz imbusowy typ L

description.name: Drill stopper 3pcs 6mm 8mm 10mm
description.long_desc:
Zestaw ograniczników głębokości wiercenia. Ograniczniki tego typu umożliwiają wykonywanie dowolnej liczny otworów o dokładnie takiej samej głębokości. Mogą być stosowane z każtego rodzaju wiertłami krętymi.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • w zestawie trzy ograniczniki na wiertła o średnicy 6, 8 oraz 10 mm
  • precyzyjne wyznaczanie głębokości wiercenia
  • montowane na wiertło za pomocą śruby obsługiwanej imbusem

description.name: Foldable ladder 3 steps
description.long_desc:
Folding metal ladder with three steps is a practical tool for performing various tasks at height. The ladder is blue with black elements, giving it an elegant appearance. Each step is covered with a black, textured coating for comfort and secure footing.


At the top of the ladder, there is a black, rounded handle that facilitates climbing up and down and prevents loss of balance. The ladder also has black rubber caps on the feet, securing it from sliding and protecting the floor from scratches.


The ladder is easy to use and fold, allowing you to quickly fold it and move it to any place.



  • Step dimensions: 38x26 cm

  • Working height: 72 cm

  • Dimensions when unfolded: 47 x 68 x 116 cm

  • Dimensions when folded: 47 x 8 x 125 cm

description.name: Safety shoes model no. 10 S1P standard - size 44
description.long_desc:
High-quality, lightweight, and breathable safety shoes with a sporty design. Footwear from the renowned GEKO brand stands out for its meticulous craftsmanship, resulting in high user comfort. Despite their sporty design, the shoes comply with the EN ISO 20345 standard and meet all the guidelines for footwear marked S1PSRA.


Shoes of S1 class, unlike S3 class, do not have increased waterproofing. However, they are much more breathable because the upper is made of textile material.


They are ideal for work in closed warehouses and during spring/summer seasons.


Product Characteristics:



  • Meticulous craftsmanship using high-quality materials

  • Compliant with the EN ISO 20345 standard

  • Lightweight and breathable

  • Sporty shoe cut

  • Excellent for work in closed halls and during the spring/summer season

  • The upper is made of breathable and durable textile material, allowing the foot to breathe and not sweat


Protection Class: S1P SRA


Categories of Safety Footwear according to PN-EN ISO 20345:



  • Toecap protecting the toes from impact with energy of 200J

  • Sole with antistatic and antislip properties

  • Absorption of energy in the heel part

  • Sole with Kevlar insole for puncture resistance, protecting the foot from the consequence of stepping on sharp objects

  • Resistance to slipping on ceramic surfaces covered with a solution of sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS)


PU Sole


The sole is made of polyurethane, equipped with a Kevlar insole for puncture resistance, protecting the foot from the consequence of stepping on sharp objects


SRA - Slip-resistant deeply treaded sole



  • Resistance to slipping on ceramic surfaces covered with a solution of sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS)


Technical Data:



  • Upper: textile material

  • Liner: breathable mesh fabric

  • Sole: Polyurethane PU

  • Replaceable insole: yes

  • Compliance with standards: CE EN ISO 20345:2011

  • Protection class: S1 SRA

  • Additional footwear properties: P – resistance to penetration from the ground

High-quality, lightweight, and breathable safety shoes with a sporty design. Footwear from the renowned GEKO brand stands out for its meticulous craftsmanship, resulting in high user comfort. Despite their sporty design, the shoes comply with the EN ISO 20345 standard and meet all the guidelines for footwear marked S1PSRA.


Shoes of S1 class, unlike S3 class, do not have increased waterproofing. However, they are much more breathable because the upper is made of textile material.


They are ideal for work in closed warehouses and during spring/summer seasons.


Product Characteristics:



  • Meticulous craftsmanship using high-quality materials

  • Compliant with the EN ISO 20345 standard

  • Lightweight and breathable

  • Sporty shoe cut

  • Excellent for work in closed halls and during the spring/summer season

  • The upper is made of breathable and durable textile material, allowing the foot to breathe and not sweat


Protection Class: S1P SRA


Categories of Safety Footwear according to PN-EN ISO 20345:



  • Toecap protecting the toes from impact with energy of 200J

  • Sole with antistatic and antislip properties

  • Absorption of energy in the heel part

  • Sole with Kevlar insole for puncture resistance, protecting the foot from the consequence of stepping on sharp objects

  • Resistance to slipping on ceramic surfaces covered with a solution of sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS)


PU Sole


The sole is made of polyurethane, equipped with a Kevlar insole for puncture resistance, protecting the foot from the consequence of stepping on sharp objects


SRA - Slip-resistant deeply treaded sole



  • Resistance to slipping on ceramic surfaces covered with a solution of sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS)

  • Upper: textile material

  • Sole: Polyurethane PU

  • Replaceable insole: yes

  • Protection class: S1 SRA

  • Additional footwear properties: P – resistance to penetration from the ground

  • Toecap protecting the toes from impact with energy of 200J

  • Sole with antistatic and antislip properties

  • Absorption of energy in the heel part

  • Sole with Kevlar insole for puncture resistance, protecting the foot from the consequence of stepping on sharp objects

  • Resistance to slipping on ceramic surfaces covered with a solution of sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS)


PU Sole


The sole is made of polyurethane, equipped with a Kevlar insole for puncture resistance, protecting the foot from the consequence of stepping on sharp objects


SRA - Slip-resistant deeply treaded sole



  • Resistance to slipping on ceramic surfaces covered with a solution of sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS)


Technical Data:



  • Upper: textile material

  • Liner: breathable mesh fabric

  • Sole: Polyurethane PU

  • Replaceable insole: yes

  • Compliance with standards: CE EN ISO 20345:2011

  • Protection class: S1 SRA

  • Additional footwear properties: P – resistance to penetration from the ground
description.description:
High-quality, lightweight, and breathable safety shoes with a sporty design. Footwear from the renowned GEKO brand stands out for its meticulous craftsmanship, resulting in high user comfort. Despite their sporty design, the shoes comply with the EN ISO 20345 standard and meet all the guidelines for footwear marked S1PSRA.


Shoes of S1 class, unlike S3 class, do not have increased waterproofing. However, they are much more breathable because the upper is made of textile material.


They are ideal for work in closed warehouses and during spring/summer seasons.

  • Meticulous craftsmanship using high-quality materials

description.name: Set of drills 1,5-6,5mm 13pcs hex
description.long_desc:
HSS TiN drill bit set with HEX mounting. The set includes 13 drills with a diameter of 1.5-6.5mm. Designed for drilling in non-ferrous metals, steel sheets and plastics.


The drill bits are made of HSS high-speed steel coated with TiN (titanium nitride).


The TiN-coated drill bits are designed in particular for machining difficult-to-cut materials. The use of the TiN coating results in an increase in the hardness of the drills, enables the acceleration of the cutting process and allows for better quality of the machined elements. The titanium nitride layer, thanks to the reduction of the friction force, reduces sharp wear, and thus extends the life of the drill bit.


Technical data:

























Typespiral
MaterialHSS Steel
LayerTiN (titanium nitride)
ChuckHEX
Diameters [mm]1.5 / 2.0 / 2.5 / 3.0 / 3.2 / 3.5 / 4.0 / 4.5 / 4.8 / 5.0 / 5.5 / 6.0 / 6.5

description.name: Washing gun model name : Tsunami
description.long_desc:
Wysokiej jakości pistolet do prania i czyszczenia różnego rodzaju powierzchni, przeznaczony zarówno dla amatorów jak i profesjonalistów. Pistolet posiada regulację dozowania środka chemicznego która pozwala na dostosowanie ilości roztworu do rodzaju czyszczonej powierzchni.

Cechy produktu

  • Metalowa dysza - idealna do komercyjnych zastosowań
  • Mosiężna rurka rotacyjna
  • Wytrzymała metalowa konstrukcja
  • Regulacja ilości podawanej chemii

Dane techniczne

  • Ciśnienie robocze: 6,5 - 9 bar
  • Pojemność zbiornika: 1000 ml
  • Zużycie powietrza: 280 l/min

Zawartość opakowania

  • Pistolet wraz z przyłączem powietrza
  • Zbiornik 1000 ml
  • Dwa adaptery nakręcane na dysze (jeden ze szczotką)
  • Opakowanie
